OUR
PLANET

funny panda

The big panda is a vulnerable species. Until 2017, it was considered an endangered species, characterized by an ever-decreasing population, both in the wild and in captivity. Scientists suggest that there are about 2060 individuals left in the wild. The big panda is a symbol of the World Wildlife Fund.

beatiful
nature

Everyone knows that the time spent in nature has a good effect on our health. Every day we are surrounded by the beauty of nature, but, unfortunately, we rarely enjoy it.
